ðŸ“– Summary: AirRemote is a solution that transforms traditional IR-controlled devices into smart devices accessible via a web interface. It allows users to record IR signals from existing remotes, replay them remotely, and create automations for scheduled operations. The system also includes a captive portal for easy device setup and a web interface for managing connected devices.
